section.title: Overview
section.lines: This page provides information on Admins in the Openstack Queuing Solution.

section.title: Purpose of this Feature
section.lines: There are three role types available in OQS:

ol.li: admin : In addition to 'user' privileges, Admin can perform CRUD operations for the Pods/Deployments.
superAdmin : This role type has no restrictions.
When logged in as a superAdmin, click on the username in the top right corner of the tool.
From the dropdown menu, click on 'Admins'.
In the 'Admins' page, click 'Create new Admin'.
Enter the signum of the user that requires Admin/SuperAdmin role.
Using Radio buttons, select the role required.
When logged in as a superAdmin, click on the username in the top right corner of the tool.
From the dropdown menu, click on 'Admins'.
To delete an Admin/superAdmin, click the 'Delete' button.
